author: metachris_
content: A new issue of the mev-boost & ecosystem status update is out: https://boost.flashbots.net/mev-boost-status-updates/mev-boost-status-update-july-15-29-2022

author: metachris_
content: yes, there was a the brief AWS outage, and it seems the ropsten relay services needs another restart, should be back online in a bit

author: parithosh
content:
Around ~30% of goerli shadow fork 5 is running mev boost. I don't see any perceivable  difference in the network with the relayer returning 502's - which is great news. The teku node i've running puts out log messages with late blocks, i can see none - also good news. 

I'll be deprecating the network soon, unless someone has another test they'd like to run. We'll of course test this error case more intensely in future testnets as well.

author: tersec
content: would be interested in having some gsf Nimbus validators run MEV too

author: tersec
content: probably not gsf5, that cycle has come and gone, but for the next one
